head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCCARTHY, FRANK A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCCARTHY, FRANK A.

block.p: McCARTHY-Frank A. On Jan. 30, 2000. Beloved uncle of Dorothy E. Dunn and Mary Smack. Devoted cousin of Joan McNiff and Robert Lee. Friends may call at the Williams Funeral Home, Inc., 5628 Broadway at 232nd St., Bronx on Wednesday from 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian burial Thursday in Sacred Heart Church, Shonnard Place, Yonkers at 9:45 AM. Interment Calvary Cemetery.
